function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restructuring the team based on medical project requirements","Impact":"Potential disruption in team dynamics and workflow","Mitigation":"Provide training and support for team members to adapt to new roles and responsibilities","Technologies":"Training materials, project management tools","People":"Team members, project stakeholders","Owner":"Project manager"},{"Description":"Prolonged discussions with doctors","Impact":"Delays in decision-making and project progress","Mitigation":"Establish clear timelines and objectives for discussions, involve a mediator if necessary","Technologies":"Communication tools, project management software","People":"Project team, doctors","Owner":"Project manager"}]}
